processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species discretus;

treatment.description: Resembling coarser states of no. 123; primocanes 4or 5 dm. high, copiously stipitate-glandular and with long subulate prickles; primocane-leaves with 5 leaflets; terminal leaflet ovate, doubly serrate, abruptly long-acuminate; the prickly petiole stipitate-glandular; corymb with strongly ascending long pedicels strongly armed with long gland-tipped divergent hairs.
